downloadTitle: Microsoft Office Audio File: Interview with Michael Worosz about Microsoft Office Excel 2007
downloadDescription: This audio file contains an interview with Product Manager Michael Worosz about Microsoft Office Excel 2007.
detailsSection:
This audio file contains an interview with Product Manager Michael Worosz about Excel 2007.

Note: These files do not collect any personal information.
systemRequirementsSection: • This download contains audio files in MP3 and .wma format. You will need a media player capable of playing either of these file formats such as Microsoft Windows Media Player 10.
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:
  1. Double-click the Excel 2007.exe program file on your hard disk to extract the files to your computer.
  2. Choose a location on your hard disk to store the audio files.

Instructions for use:
  • To play a file directly, double-click it. You may also save it to an audio device, such as an MP3 player.

To remove this download:
  • To delete this download, click the MP3 or .wma audio file and then press Delete.
